msg: added the new mojos into the build cycle.

author: tfischer
msg: - implemented sql, sqlExec and doc tasks
- changed DataModelTask to be able to use it in more than one child classes
The test cases still need to be fixing, but in my opinion, the committed mojos are quite functional.
